Uses of Interface
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.UtilizationModel

Packages that use UtilizationModel
Package Description
org.cloudbus.cloudsim  
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter  

  • Uses of UtilizationModel in org.cloudbus.cloudsim

    Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim that implement UtilizationModel
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  UtilizationModelFull
    The UtilizationModelFull class is a simple model, according to which a Cloudlet always utilize all the available CPU capacity.
    class  UtilizationModelNull
    The UtilizationModelNull class is a simple model, according to which a Cloudlet always require zero capacity.
    class  UtilizationModelPlanetLabInMemory
    The Class UtilizationModelPlanetLab.
    class  UtilizationModelStochastic
    The UtilizationModelStochastic class implements a model, according to which a Cloudlet generates random CPU utilization every time frame.
    Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim that return UtilizationModel
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    UtilizationModel Cloudlet.getUtilizationModelBw()
    Gets the utilization model bw.
    UtilizationModel Cloudlet.getUtilizationModelCpu()
    Gets the utilization model cpu.
    UtilizationModel Cloudlet.getUtilizationModelRam()
    Gets the utilization model ram.

    Sets the utilization model cpu.
    void Cloudlet.setUtilizationModelRam​(UtilizationModel utilizationModelRam)
